narrativeElements.localizedNarrativeDescription: Lee Sang-hyeok is a quiet, studious kid who loves to play games. After trying League of Legends for the first time, he quickly climbs the ranks. South Korea's most prominent professional team, SK Telecom T1, takes notice.

As the previously unknown "solo queue demon," Faker skyrockets to stardom with his flashy plays, dismantling the world's best players. His road brings him to a climactic battle for the Summoner's Cup in Los Angeles.

As LoL Esports develops, SKT T1 and Faker seek world domination. Over the next three years, Faker qualifies for three-straight Worlds finals. He wins twice before eventually falling in a heartbreaking match against rival SSG.

After the toughest defeat of his career, Faker and T1 pick up the pieces and rebuild. He chases an elusive fourth world championship, facing greater challenges every year in his quest to reclaim the title of Unkillable Demon King.

Steeled by experience, Faker evolves from a solo-killing prodigy into a seasoned leader. He and his teammates defeat some of the best teams in League of Legends history to reclaim their throne. Nothing will stand in Faker's way now.

Ten domestic championships. Two MSI crowns. Four Summoner's Cups. These accolades make Faker the greatest of all time. But his tireless motivation and will to keep winningthat's what makes him a living legend.

event.localizedUpsellTooltipDescription: Relive Faker's career highlights through 100 levels of unlockable rewards! See the Event Hub for more details.
